translated: Just as the bodhisattvas, those who love their own lives should not kill, those who love their own wealth should not steal, those who love their own wives should not violate others', those who love their own truthfulness should not deceive others, those who love harmony should not separate others, those who love straightforwardness should not be deceitful, those who love gentleness should not scold harshly, those who love contentment will never covet others' desires, those who love kindness and forgiveness will never give rise to anger towards others, those who love right views will never teach others to give rise to wrong views.

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！

analyzed: 我見如是諸菩薩等，欲求無上大菩提者，悉為樂故而求菩提，無有為苦求之者也。
translated: I see that all these bodhisattvas who wish to seek the unsurpassed great enlightenment do so for the sake of happiness, not for the sake of suffering.

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 是故我說己所不欲，勿勸他人。
analyzed: 是故我說己所不欲，勿勸他人。
translated: Therefore, I say that one should not encourage others to do what one does not wish for oneself.

original: 如是等法，菩薩摩訶薩應當守護。
analyzed: 如是等法，菩薩摩訶薩應當守護。

original: 」佛言：

original: 「善男子！

analyzed: 善男子！ 一切諸法本無有法，如來覺證；
translated: Good man!🔽All dharmas are originally without any dharma - this is what the Tathāgata has realized and awakened to;

analyzed: 一切諸法本無有滅，如來覺證；
translated: all dharmas are originally without any cessation - this is what the Tathāgata has realized and awakened to;

original: 一切諸法性離二邊，如來覺證；
analyzed: 一切諸法性離二邊，如來覺證；
translated: all dharmas are free from the two extremes - this is what the Tathāgata has realized and awakened to;

original: 一切諸法本無有實，如來覺證。
analyzed: 一切諸法本無有實，如來覺證。
translated: all dharmas are originally without any reality - this is what the Tathāgata has realized and awakened to.

original: 「復次善男子！
analyzed: 「復次善男子！
translated: Next, good sons!

analyzed: 一切諸法，皆從自業因緣力故而得生起；

original: 如是等事，如來覺知。

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！
translated: Good sons!

analyzed: 何故法性名之為藏？

analyzed: 以諸眾生世出世智，皆依此藏而得生故。

analyzed: 如以實智觀彼法性，智依彼生，故名為藏。
translated: If one observes the nature of dharmas with true wisdom, wisdom arises in dependence on it, and is therefore called a treasury.

original: 「復次善男子！
analyzed: 「復次善男子！
translated: Next, good sons!

analyzed: 我亦復說一切諸法如幻如焰，如水中月，如是等事，如來覺證；
translated: I also say that all dharmas are like illusions, like flames, like the moon in water, and so forth. The Tathāgata has realized these things;

original: 又善男子！
analyzed: 又善男子！
translated: Moreover, good sons!

original: 諸法性相，一味解脫，如是等事，如來覺證。
analyzed: 諸法性相，一味解脫，如是等事，如來覺證。
translated: The nature and characteristics of all dharmas are of one taste in liberation. The Tathāgata has realized such things;

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！

analyzed: 如是解脫一味法性，是名遍照光明之藏。

original: 「復次善男子！
analyzed: 「復次善男子！
translated: Moreover, good sons!

translated: Namely, all dharmas are non-arising, non-ceasing, non-increasing, non-decreasing, non-coming, non-going, non-grasping, non-discarding, neither causes nor conditions.

original: 如是等法，如來覺證。
analyzed: 如是等法，如來覺證。
translated: Such dharmas the Tathāgata has realized.

original: 「復次善男子！
analyzed: 「復次善男子！
translated: Moreover, good sons!

original: 如是之法，如來覺證。
analyzed: 如是之法，如來覺證。

original: 善男子！

translated: The above-mentioned dharmas are all realized and attained by the Tathāgata.

analyzed: 又有無量諸菩薩等住於諸地；
translated: there were also innumerable bodhisattvas dwelling on the grounds;

analyzed: 又有無量諸菩薩等證得百千諸大三昧；
translated: there were also innumerable bodhisattvas who realized hundreds of thousands of great samādhis;

analyzed: 又有無量塵數眾生發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心；

analyzed: 又有無量無邊眾生得阿羅漢果；
translated: there were also innumerable sentient beings who attained the fruit of arhatship;

analyzed: 諸在會眾悉不唐捐，無有一人而空過者。

original: 爾時佛告羅睺羅言：
analyzed: 爾時佛告羅睺羅言：

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！

analyzed: 我等誓於娑婆世界後時後分，見有堪能為法器者，我當為彼宣說是經，惟願世尊不以為慮。
translated: We vow that in the future of this Sahā world, if we see those who are able to become Dharma vessels, we will proclaim this sūtra for them. We only wish that the World-Honored One will not worry about this.

original: 」爾時四天王復白佛言：
analyzed: 」爾時四天王復白佛言：
translated: At that time, the Four Heavenly Kings again addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 何以故？

analyzed: 我此所說遍照光明藏無字法門，我得佛來未曾演說，今為汝等而演說之。
translated: The door of the Dharma of the treasury of light that illuminates everywhere, which I have not yet expounded since attaining Buddhahood, I now expound for you.

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！
translated: Good sons!

analyzed: 彼未來世諸眾生等，若得聞此希有法門，當知是人久已成就無量福慧；
translated: If sentient beings in the future hear this rare Dharma door, know that this person has long since accomplished immeasurable blessings and wisdom;

original: 當知是人則為承事供養於我；
analyzed: 當知是人則為承事供養於我；
translated: know that this person will then serve and make offerings to me;

analyzed: 當知是人則為荷擔佛大菩提；

analyzed: 當知是人決定當得成就辯才；
translated: know that this person will definitely attain accomplished eloquence;

original: 當知是人決定當得清淨佛土；
analyzed: 當知是人決定當得清淨佛土；
translated: know that this person will definitely attain a pure buddha land;

analyzed: 當知是人臨命終時定當得見阿彌陀佛，菩薩大眾之所圍繞；
translated: know that this person, when their life is ending, will definitely get to see Amitābha Buddha, surrounded by the assembly of bodhisattvas;

original: 當知是人常見我身在靈鷲山，及見此等諸菩薩眾；
analyzed: 當知是人常見我身在靈鷲山，及見此等諸菩薩眾；
translated: know that this person will always see my body on Vulture Peak, and see the assembly of bodhisattvas;

original: 當知是人則為已得無盡法藏；
analyzed: 當知是人則為已得無盡法藏；
translated: know that this person will then have already attained the inexhaustible Dharma treasury;

original: 當知是人得宿命智；
analyzed: 當知是人得宿命智；
translated: know that this person will attain the wisdom of past lives;

original: 當知是人不墮惡道。
analyzed: 當知是人不墮惡道。
translated: One should know that such a person will not fall into evil realms.

original: 「復次善男子！
analyzed: 「復次善男子！
translated: Moreover, good sons!

original: 今我說是未曾有法，若當來世有善男子及善女人，設有已作五逆等罪，聞此法門，若能書、持、讀誦、解說，或勸他人書、持、讀誦及以解說，我見是人不墮惡道，其人所有諸煩惱障、業障、報障，皆得清淨，其人來世具得五眼，其人則為一切諸佛所共灌頂，其人則為諸佛世尊及諸菩薩之所護念，其人來世在在所生，具足諸根無有缺減。
analyzed: 今我說是未曾有法，若當來世有善男子及善女人，設有已作五逆等罪，聞此法門，若能書、持、讀誦、解說，或勸他人書、持、讀誦及以解說，我見是人不墮惡道，其人所有諸煩惱障、業障、報障，皆得清淨，其人來世具得五眼，其人則為一切諸佛所共灌頂，其人則為諸佛世尊及諸菩薩之所護念，其人來世在在所生，具足諸根無有缺減。
translated: Now I proclaim this unprecedented Dharma. If in the future there are good men and good women who have committed the five heinous crimes, if they hear this teaching and are able to write it out, uphold it, recite it, explain it, or encourage others to write it out, uphold it, recite it, and explain it, I see that such a person will not fall into evil realms. All the afflictive hindrances, karmic hindrances, and retributions of such a person will be purified. Such a person will in the future attain the five eyes. Such a person will be consecrated by all the Buddhas. Such a person will be protected and remembered by the Buddhas, World-Honored Ones, and Bodhisattvas. Such a person will in the future be born with complete faculties, without deficiency.
